goal.ch: "憲法基本上由基本權利與國家組織（含國家目標）兩大部分構成。本學期將以基本權利為重點。希望選課同學能由實務（主要是司法院大法官解釋）瞭解基本權利在法律體系中所發揮的作用，具備參加國家考試的能力。本課程可折抵法律與政府研究所第二專長的「憲法」"
goal.en: Constitutional law are basically divided into two parts : the basic rights and state organizations (including national goals). This semester will focus on the basic rights. Its goal is that students will be able to understand the role of basic rights in the legal system and be qualified to participate in national examinations.
